summary: Pac-Man is a classic video game from 1980 where you control a character who eats dots in a maze while avoiding ghosts. Eating special power-ups lets Pac-Man temporarily eat the ghosts for extra points. It was made by a team led by Toru Iwatani, who wanted a game that would appeal to women and men alike. The game was a huge success, leading to many sequels, toys, and even TV shows. Pac-Man is still one of the most popular and highest-grossing games ever made.
title: Pac-Man
